content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [QA_Landing].[VALIDATEDATASERIALSONTRANSIT]    Script Date: 11/01/2023 09:43:51 a. m. ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
ALTER PROC [QA_Landing].[VALIDATEDATASERIALSONTRANSIT] AS

/******



Autor: Abraham D. Sánchez bSide
CreatedDate: 2022-10-12
ModifiedDate: 2022-10-12
ModifiedBy: Abraham D. Sánchez bSide
Description: Create SP VALIDATEDATASERIALSONTRANSIT



******/

    DECLARE @logid AS BIGINT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(15),
                               FORMAT(Getdate(), 'yyMMddHHmmssmmm'))

    EXEC [DBO].[GEN_SPLOGINSERTS]
      '05 VALIDATEDATASERIALSONTRANSIT',
      'Execute insert table VALIDATEDATASERIALSONTRANSIT',
      @logid

    DECLARE @result        VARCHAR (5000) = '',
            @code          INT,
            @state         INT,
            @message       VARCHAR (5000) = '',
            @stacktracetxt INT

  BEGIN TRY

  truncate table [QA_LANDING].[TMP_STREAM_SERIALS_IN_TRANSIT]

      INSERT INTO [QA_LANDING].[TMP_STREAM_SERIALS_IN_TRANSIT]
                  ([SERIES],
                   [STATUS],
                   [ID],
                   [DESCRIPTION],
                   [SOURCE_WAREHOUSE],
                   [SOURCE_SUB_INVENTORY],
                   [DESTINATION_WAREHOUSE],
                   [DESTINATION_SUB_INVENTORY],
                   [TRANSACTION_DATE],
                   [SHIPPING_NUMBER],
                   [FILE_NAME],
                   [CREATE_DATE])
      (SELECT [SERIE],
              [STATUS],
              [ARTICULO],
              [DESCRIPCION],
              [ALMACEN_ORIGEN],
              [SUB_INVENTARIO_ORIGEN],
              [ALMACEN_DESTINO],
              [SUB_INVENTARIO_DESTINO],
              [FECHA_TRANSACCION],
              [NUMERO_ENVIO],
              [QUERY_NAME],
              [CREATE_DATE]
       FROM   [QA_LANDING].[SERIESENTRANSITO])

      DELETE FROM [QA_LANDING].[FALLBACK_REPORT]
      WHERE  UPPER(FILE_NAME) LIKE 'SERIESENTRANSITO%'

      INSERT INTO [QA_LANDING].[FALLBACK_REPORT]
                  ([KEY],
                   [VALUE],
                   FILE_NAME,
                   STOCK_INVENTORY_DATE,
                   STATUS,
                   CREATED_DATE,
                   MODIFIED_DATE)
      (SELECT DISTINCT 'SKU'       ENTITY,
                       SSH.ID      NAME,
                       SSH.FILE_NAME,
                       CREATE_DATE STOCK_INVENTORY_DATE,
                       0,
                       [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate()),
                       [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate())
       FROM   [QA_LANDING].[TMP_STREAM_SERIALS_IN_TRANSIT] SSH
              LEFT OUTER JOIN [QA_LANDING].[PHYSICAL_RESOURCE_SPECIFICATION] PT
                           ON PT.STOCK_KEEPING_UNIT = Upper(TRIM(SSH.ID))
       WHERE  PT.STOCK_KEEPING_UNIT IS NULL
       UNION
       SELECT DISTINCT 'SALES CHANNEL'      ENTITY,
                       SSH.SOURCE_WAREHOUSE NAME,
                       SSH.FILE_NAME,
                       CREATE_DATE          STOCK_INVENTORY_DATE,
                       0,
                       [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate()),
                       [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate())
       FROM   [QA_LANDING].[TMP_STREAM_SERIALS_IN_TRANSIT] SSH
              LEFT OUTER JOIN [QA_LANDING].[SALESCHANNEL] SC
                           ON SC.NAME = SSH.SOURCE_WAREHOUSE
       WHERE  SC.NAME IS NULL
       UNION
       SELECT DISTINCT 'SALES CHANNEL'           ENTITY,
                       SSH.DESTINATION_WAREHOUSE NAME,
                       SSH.FILE_NAME,
                       CREATE_DATE               STOCK_INVENTORY_DATE,
                       0,
                       [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate()),
                       [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate())
       FROM   [QA_LANDING].[TMP_STREAM_SERIALS_IN_TRANSIT] SSH
              LEFT OUTER JOIN [QA_LANDING].[SALESCHANNEL] SC
                           ON SC.NAME = SSH.DESTINATION_WAREHOUSE
       WHERE  SC.NAME IS NULL)

      INSERT INTO [QA_LANDING].[FALLBACK_REPORT_ARCHIVED]
      SELECT *
      FROM   QA_LANDING.FALLBACK_REPORT 

     
      SET @result = 'success'

      SELECT @result;
  --COMMIT TRANSACTION     
  END TRY

  BEGIN CATCH
      --  ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
      SET @result='failure'
      SET @code = (SELECT ERROR_NUMBER())
      SET @state = (SELECT ERROR_STATE())
      SET @message = (SELECT ERROR_MESSAGE())
	  set @stackTraceTxt = 0
      TRUNCATE TABLE [QA_LANDING].[TEMP_ERROR_LOG]

      INSERT INTO [QA_LANDING].[TEMP_ERROR_LOG]
                  (CODE,
                   STATE,
                   MESSAGE,
                   STACKTRACETXT,
                   STATUS,
                   TASKNAME)
      -- VALUES (@code,@state ,@message ,@stackTraceTxt,@result,'ValidateDataSerialsOnTransit')
      (SELECT @code,
              @state,
              @message,
              @stacktracetxt,
              @result,
              'ValidateDataSerialsOnTransit')

      INSERT INTO QA_LANDING.ERROR_LOG
                  (CODE,
                   STATE,
                   MESSAGE,
                   STACKTRACETXT,
                   STATUS,
                   TASKNAME,
                   CREATED_DATE)
      (SELECT CODE,
              STATE,
              MESSAGE,
              STACKTRACETXT,
              STATUS,
              TASKNAME,
              [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate] (getdate())
       FROM   [QA_LANDING].[TEMP_ERROR_LOG])
  END CATCH

    SELECT @result; 

	  UPDATE dbo.gen_Logs SET FIN = [dbo].[ufn_GetLocalDate](GETDATE()) WHERE LogID = @logID
